text.content: LassoNet: A Neural Network with Feature Sparsity

title.plain_text: LassoNet: A Neural Network with Feature Sparsity

text.content: We introduce LassoNet, a neural network framework with global feature selection. LassoNet uses projected proximal gradient descent, and generalizes directly to deep networks

rich_text.plain_text: We introduce LassoNet, a neural network framework with global feature selection. LassoNet uses projected proximal gradient descent, and generalizes directly to deep networks

text.content: We discuss related work on feature selection

text.content: To optimize LassoNet we find that a dense-to-sparse warm start approach is far more effective than a sparse-to-dense approach.
